content: viśramatte pīḍanaṅṅaḷāyi māŧŧukayuṁ, naśvaralōkatte veṟukkukayuṁ, anaśvaramaṇavaṟa tanikkāyi nēṭukayuṁ ceyta pariśuddha pitāvāya māṟ..........ninakku bhāgyaṁ. itā niṉṟe ōṟmma svaṟggattiluṁ bhūmiyiluṁ muḻaṅṅukayuṁ niṉṟe perunnāḷ uyarattiluṁ āḻattiluṁ śrēṣ‌ṭhatappeṭukayuṁ ceyyu nnu. ninđe pukaḻ‌cayuṭe divasatte koṇṭāṭiyirikkunna ī janasaṁghatte sakala duṣṭaśatrukkaḷil ninnuṁ paiśācika keṇikaḷilninnuṁ niṉṟe prāṟtthanakaḷāl kāttukoḷḷaṇame. ninđe s‌maraṇaye śrēṣ‌ṭhatappeṭuttiya daivamāya maśihā! ninne ñaṅṅaḷ stōtraṁ ceyyunnu. hōre.........

māṟ.........ye tiraññeṭukkukayuṁ, taṉṟe śrēṣ‌ṭhatayuṭe ślīhāyāyi niyamikkukayuṁ, taṉṟe suviśēṣaṁ prasaṁgikku vāṉ śakti nalkukayuṁ ceyta kaṟttāvinu stuti. itā viśuddhasabha addēhattiṉṟe ōṟmma divasatte āghōṣi kkunnu. tanikk ī samayattuṁ......

śrēṣṭha ślīhāyāya māṟ... aṅṅayuṭe perunnāḷine ñaṅṅaḷ bahumānapūṟvvaṁ ācariccukoṇṭ paṟayunnu. viśu ddha sabhayuṭe kōṭṭayākunna bhāgyavānē! samādhānattōṭe varika. sakalavuṁ upēkṣicc saṟvvādhināthane anugamicca jñāniyē! samādhānattōṭe varika. satyaviśvāsakaḷe pīḍippikkunnavarilninn raktapaṅkilamāya kaṣṭatakaḷ anubhavicca śrēṣṭhanāyuḷḷāvē! samādhānattōṭe varika. iva mūlaṁ aviṭutte asthikaḷilninn manuṣyaṟkk sahāyaṅṅa ḷuṁ rōgikaḷkk svasthatayuṁ puṟappeṭunnu. ākayāl ñaṅṅaḷ aṅṅayōṭapēkṣikkunnu; aṅṅayuṭe nāthanōṭu ñaṅṅaḷkk kaṭaṅṅaḷuṭeyuṁ pāpaṅṅaḷuṭeyuṁ mōcanaṁ nalku vānuṁ, nalla avasānattinuṁ tanne snēhicca nītimānmāruṭe ōharikkuṁ ñaṅṅaḷe aṟharākkittīṟkkuvānuṁ ñaṅṅaḷkku vēṇṭi apēkṣikkaṇame. nāṁ tanikku stutiyuṁ stōtravuṁ kaŧŧaṇaṁ. hōśo.......
